005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFieldValue;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaField;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.impl.AbstractAllowedValue;
017
018import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
020
021@SuppressWarnings({
022    "PMD.DataClass",
023    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
024    "null"
025})
026@MetaschemaField(
027    formalName = "Allowed Value Enumeration",
028    name = "constraint-value-enum",
029    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
030public class ConstraintValueEnum
031    extends AbstractAllowedValue
032    implements IBoundObject {
033  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
034
035  @BoundFlag(
036      formalName = "Allowed Value Enumeration Value",
037      name = "value",
038      required = true,
039      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
040  private String _value;
041
042  @BoundFlag(
043      formalName = "Allowed Value Deprecation Version",
044      name = "deprecated",
045      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
046  private String _deprecated;
047
048  @BoundFieldValue(
049      valueKeyName = "remark",
050      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
051  private MarkupLine _remark;
052
053  public ConstraintValueEnum() {
054    this(null);
055  }
056
057  public ConstraintValueEnum(IMetaschemaData data) {
058    this.__metaschemaData = data;
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
063    return __metaschemaData;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public String getValue() {
068    return _value;
069  }
070
071  public void setValue(String value) {
072    _value = value;
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  public String getDeprecated() {
077    return _deprecated;
078  }
079
080  public void setDeprecated(String value) {
081    _deprecated = value;
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public MarkupLine getRemark() {
086    return _remark;
087  }
088
089  public void setRemark(MarkupLine value) {
090    _remark = value;
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public String toString() {
095    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
096  }
097}
